ctx: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B H1 : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) H2 : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} l : list A b : forall a : A, Bar A (GoodR A R) (a :: l) H : forall a : A, GRBar B S (map f (a :: l)) Unable to unify "GoodR ?M1487 ?M1488 (?M1489 :: ?M1490)" with "Bar B (GoodR B S) (map f l)".

ctx: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHH3 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B H1 : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) H2 : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} l : list A b : forall a : A, Bar A (GoodR A R) (a :: l) H : forall a : A, GRBar B S (f a :: map f l) Unable to unify "S (f ?M5381) (f ?M5382)" with "GoodR B S (map f l)".

ctx: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3.
exceptions.exn: The reference a was not found in the current environment.

original: intros A B R S f H1 H2 l H3. induction H3. - constructor. - simpl. apply SearchG. apply IHH3. intros a l' H4. apply H1, H4. apply H2 with (b:=f a). reflexivity.
